steps.title: Draw three trapezoids of different sizes and orientations which are connected to each other.
steps.content: Draw three trapezoids of different sizes and orientations which are connected to each other. This will be the framework for the wings.

steps.title: Draw two straight lines with a space apart and which follow the orientation of the trapezoids – three layers are formed.
steps.content: Draw two straight lines with a space apart and which follow the orientation of the trapezoids – three layers are formed.

steps.title: Draw the feathers for the first layer using simple and rounded curves.
steps.content: Draw the feathers for the first layer using simple and rounded curves.

steps.title: Draw the second layer of feather using simple curves and longer than the first layer feathers.
steps.content: Draw the second layer of feather using simple curves and longer than the first layer feathers.

steps.title: Draw the third layer feathers using simple curves.
steps.content: Draw the third layer feathers using simple curves. The feathers are longer and more refined.

steps.title: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary lines.

steps.title: Color to your liking with shades of white!
steps.content: Color to your liking with shades of white!

steps.title: Draw 2 connected curves on the lower part of the diamond.
steps.content: Draw 2 connected curves on the lower part of the diamond.

steps.title: Draw a row of fang-like ovals up until the end of the curve.
steps.content: Draw a row of fang-like ovals up until the end of the curve. Then create two more rows of ovals below the first row, making three rows of ovals in total.

steps.title: Draw the same ovals at the intersection of the diamond and the curve.
steps.content: Draw the same ovals at the intersection of the diamond and the curve. This time, though, have the ovals gradually growing bigger and fanning out (see image).

steps.title: Draw bigger longer feathers, using rectangles with curved edges still following the direction of the fan.
steps.content: Draw bigger longer feathers, using rectangles with curved edges still following the direction of the fan.

steps.title: Ink your drawing, erase the sketch.
steps.content: Ink your drawing, erase the sketch.

steps.title: Color your drawing, and then create a copy of it.
steps.content: Color your drawing, and then create a copy of it. There you have it—a pair of angel wings.
